testsuite.name: Scenario: user can not login with incorrect password

testcase.name: Given command login is selected
testcase.classname: Scenario: user can not login with incorrect password

testcase.name: When username "pekka" and password "pekka123" are entered
testcase.classname: Scenario: user can not login with incorrect password

testcase.name: Then system will respond with "wrong username or password"
testcase.classname: Scenario: user can not login with incorrect password

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: user can not login with incorrect password
